long_description: A training top built to support hard-working muscles, the Sugoi Piston 140 Shirt for men enhances performance with graduated compression fabric. Ergo Sleeve construction and articulation allow for natural, unrestricted body movement. Moisture-wicking, quick-drying fabric keeps you comfortable during exertion. Zone construction featuring mesh panel inserts provides airflow and breathability. Reflective accents enhance low light visibility. Flat seams reduce chafing. Closeout.
short_description: A training top built to support hard-working muscles, the Sugoi Piston 140 Shirt for men enhances performance with graduated compression fabric.
